TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProfileProviderCollection extends System.Configuration.SettingsProviderCollection
Public NotInheritable Class ProfileProviderCollection Inherits SettingsProviderCollection

summary.span: 继承 抽象类的对象的集合。

span.span: A collection of objects that inherit the abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序的配置文件提供程序公开以只读方式通过属性类。The profile providers for an application are exposed as a read-only through the property of the class. 你可以按名称访问集合中的特定配置文件提供程序并将其强制转换为特定的提供程序类型，如。You can access a specific profile provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as . 这使您可以从多个数据存储在单个应用程序中管理用户配置文件属性。This enables you to manage user profile properties from multiple data stores in a single application. 它还允许你访问的特定配置文件提供程序不是的成员的成员抽象类。It also allows you to access members of a specific profile provider that are not members of the abstract class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例列出了为应用程序和它们各自的类型启用的提供程序。The following code example lists the providers enabled for an application and their respective types. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/CS/Providerscs.aspx#9)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/VB/Providersvb.aspx#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 创建一个新的空配置文件提供程序集合。

span.span: Creates a new, empty profile provider collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不应在代码中使用。This constructor is not intended to be used from your code. 应用程序的配置文件提供程序公开以只读方式通过属性类。The profile providers for an application are exposed as a read-only through the property of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Add(class System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase provider) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Add (provider As ProviderBase)

param.name: provider
param.span: 要添加到该集合中的配置文件提供程序。

span.span: The profile provider to add to the collection.

summary.span: 将一个配置文件提供程序添加到该集合中。

span.span: Adds a profile provider to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不适于在您的代码中使用。This method is not intended to be used from your code. 配置文件提供程序实例添加到`ProfileProviderCollection`为应用程序中使用[元素的提供程序配置文件 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f)配置元素的部分。Profile provider instances are added to the `ProfileProviderCollection` for an application using the [providers Element for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) section of the configuration element. 你可以访问配置文件提供程序的集合使用属性类。You can access the profile provider collection using the property of the class.

exception.span: 的类型不是继承 抽象类的类型。

span.span: is not of a type that inherits the abstract class.

param.name: name
param.span: 配置文件提供程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the profile provider.

summary.span: 返回指定的提供程序名称所引用的配置文件提供程序。

span.span: Returns the profile provider referenced by the specified provider name.

value.span: 继承 抽象类的对象。

span.span: An object that inherits the abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序的配置文件提供程序公开以只读方式通过属性类。The profile providers for an application are exposed as a read-only through the property of the class. 你可以按名称访问集合中的特定配置文件提供程序并将其强制转换为特定的提供程序类型，如。You can access a specific profile provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as . 这使您可以从多个数据存储在单个应用程序中管理用户配置文件属性。This enables you to manage user profile properties from multiple data stores in a single application. 它还允许你访问的特定配置文件提供程序不是的成员的成员抽象类。It also allows you to access members of a specific profile provider that are not members of the abstract class.
